name: forge-python-starter
description: A dApp starter that integrates forge-java-sdk and create-react-app and works with ABT Wallet
author: polunzh <zhenqiang@arcblock.io> https://github.com/polunzh

install-scripts.install-dependencies: git init & git submodule add  https://github.com/arcblock/Forge-java-demo.git ./templates/server/ && git submodule init && git submodule update && yarn install
